entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 27. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
